items.name: static var null: NSLayoutManager.GlyphProperty
items.desc: The null glyph, which the layout manager ignores.

items.name: static var controlCharacter: NSLayoutManager.GlyphProperty
items.desc: A glyph representing a control character.

items.name: static var elastic: NSLayoutManager.GlyphProperty
items.desc: A glyph with a changeable width, such as a white space character.

items.name: static var nonBaseCharacter: NSLayoutManager.GlyphProperty
items.desc: A glyph that combines several properties.

items.name: init(rawValue: Int)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
